:::{#about-heading}

Welcome to my website! I am a statistician at the
[U.S. Census Bureau](http://www.census.gov) in the
[Center for Statistical Research and Methodology](https://www.census.gov/topics/research/stat-research.html).
I try to post public work here. Contact me (andrew dot raim at gmail dot com)
if there is something you cannot find or have other questions or feedback.

:::
